BadRequest.description: The request was invalid or malformed

nextCursor.description: The cursor base64 encoded is used to retrieve the next page of results

pageSize.description: The number of items per page

monthlyPrice.description: Monthly price value that is valid at request time, shown with full precision

roundedMonthlyPrice.description: Used in Portal rounded to the minimal usable precision 2 digits after 0

roundedValue.description: Used in Portal rounded to the minimal usable precision 2 digits after 0

value.description: Price value that is valid at request time, shown with full precision with 11 decimals

info.description: API that provides PIM data regarding STACKIT Cloud SKUs, Products and Categories
info.title: STACKIT PIM API

get.description: Returns all categories, available for general public.
Retrieves a specific category by its ID, available for general public.
Retrieves a specific category's products, available for general public.
Retrieves a list of all marketing materials for all products, available for general public.
Retrieves a list of all products, available for general public.
Retrieves a specific product by its ID, available for general public.
Retrieves the marketing data for a specific product, available for general public.
get.summary: Get marketing data for a product

get.description: Retrieves a list of all SKUs of a product, available for general public.
Retrieves a list of all STACKIT:X SKUs of a product, available for general public.
get.summary: List STACKIT:X SKUs for a product

get.description: Retrieves a list of all SKUs, available for general public.

post.description: Accepts a JSON object with a predefined set of optional attributes to be used as search criteria.
post.summary: Performs a SKUs search with specific attributes

get.description: Retrieves a specific SKU by its ID, available for general public.
Get all STACKIT:X SKUs data that has maturity model different than alpha.
Retrieves a specific STACKIT:X SKU by its ID, available for general public.
